Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to unlawful unfair practices of proprietary institutions of higher education
Summary: Authorizes the attorney general to bring an action to enjoin unlawful unfair practices of proprietary institutions of higher education; defines unlawful unfair acts or practices.
LawCode: Add ยง349-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to unlawful unfair practices of proprietary institutions of higher education
